mapper.select: select * from tb_busker_show s, tb_busker b, tb_member m where s.busker_no = b.busker_no and m.member_no = b.member_no and date(enroll_date) = #{enrollDate}

select c.*,f.path,f.system_name,f.group_no from (select title,content,reg_date,board_no, 'q' as 'board_type',group_no from tb_qnaboard union all select title,content,reg_date,board_no, 'f' as 'board_type',group_no from tb_freeboard ) as c left outer join (select group_no,system_name,path from tb_file group by group_no) as f on c.group_no = f.group_no where title like concat('%', #{input}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{input}, '%') order by reg_date desc limit #{begin}, 10

select count(*) from (select title,content,reg_date,board_no, 'q' as 'board_type',group_no from tb_qnaboard union all select title,content,reg_date,board_no, 'f' as 'board_type',group_no from tb_freeboard ) as c left outer join (select group_no,system_name,path from tb_file group by group_no) as f on c.group_no = f.group_no where title like concat('%', #{input}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{input}, '%') order by reg_date desc
